author: James Van Straten
title: Strategy Adds Over 10K BTC to Its Bitcoin Treasury, Funded by New STRD Offering
description: Firm raises over $1 billion from high-yield preferred stock and share sales to expand record BTC holdings.
content:
Disclaimer: The analyst who wrote this piece owns shares of Strategy (MSTR).
Strategy (MSTR), the largest corporate holder of bitcoin
